    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [var]                                   1         4
    [newline]                               5         12
    [=]                                     13        14
    ['\\n']                                 15        19
L2
    [var]                                   1         4
    [dollar]                                5         11
    [=]                                     12        13
    ['$newLine']                            14        24
L3
    [var]                                   1         4
    [escaped_dollar]                        5         19
    [=]                                     20        21
    ["\\$"]                                 22        26
EOF
